questions.question: A liquid of specific gravity 0.8 is flowing through the pipe. The manometric fluid is mercury of specific gravity 13.6. Find the pressure inside the pipe. Take values of h1 = 6 cm, h2 = 20 cm, h3 = 14 cm. Refer the figure in the simulator.

A liquid of specific gravity 0.8 is flowing through the pipe. The manometric fluid is mercury of specific gravity 13.6. Find the pressure inside the pipe. Take values of h1 = 5 cm, h2 = 20 cm, h3 = 15 cm. Refer the figure in the simulator.
